plugins.name: Text Auto Fill
plugins.description:
Figma Plugin User Guide for Beginners


What It Does

This Figma plugin lets you update text and hide layers in selected frames or instances. It’s easy to use with a text-based configuration for both specific and global changes.


How to Use It

  1. Select a Frame or Instance: In Figma, click a frame or instance to edit.
  2. Open the Plugin: Run the plugin from Figma’s menu (Plugins > Your Plugin Name).
  3. Enter Configuration: In the plugin window, type instructions to change text or hide layers (see examples below).
  4. Click Run: The plugin applies your changes instantly.


Configuration Examples

• Change Specific Text: To update text in a layer named title inside a frame named block, type:

block.title: Hello World

This sets the title layer’s text to "Hello World".


• Change Text Globally: To update all layers named text in any frame, type:

text: Welcome

This changes every text layer’s text to "Welcome".


• Hide a Specific Layer: To hide a layer named subtitle in the block frame, type:

//block.subtitle

This hides the subtitle layer.


• Hide a Layer Globally: To hide all layers named icon, type:

//icon

This hides every icon layer.


• Rename a Frame: To rename a frame named block, type:

$Title block: New Frame Name

This renames the frame to "New Frame Name".


• Combine Actions: Mix specific and global changes, like:

block.title: Welcome
text: Hello
//block.subtitle
//icon

This updates block.title to "Welcome", all text layers to "Hello", hides block.subtitle, and hides all icon layers.


Tips

  1. Write one instruction per line.
  2. Layer names must match exactly (case-sensitive).
  3. Select at least one frame or instance, or you’ll get an error.
plugins.tagline: Automatically update text in frames with key-value data

plugins.name: Forma
plugins.description:
🎨 FORMA: Design Systems in Minutes, Not Months! 🚀


Ever tried creating a design system from scratch? It's like trying to fold a fitted sheet – seemingly impossible and will probably make you cry. 😭


Forma swoops in to save your sanity with magical design system generation powers:


✨ COLOR SORCERY

• Create gorgeous Pantone-style color palettes

• Generate perfect shades that actually make sense

• Turn chaotic color choices into harmonious design languages


📝 TYPOGRAPHY WIZARDRY

• Conjure complete typography hierarchies faster than you can say "Comic Sans is unacceptable"

• 9 perfectly balanced text styles that your design lead will actually approve

• Font fallbacks that won't make your developers rage-quit


🧩 DESIGN TOKENS

• Spacing systems that maintain mathematical harmony

• Size tokens that scale beautifully across devices

• Consistent radius values (because inconsistent corner radii are criminal)


⚠️ BETA ALERT ⚠️

This release is a preview of Forma's powers - not for production just yet! We're still brewing up more magical features like component generation, brand voice integration, and design consistency checks.


Created with ❤️ (and a lot of coffee) by a designer who got tired of rebuilding the same foundations over and over again.
plugins.tagline: Design System Generator

plugins.name: Prism by lumos
plugins.description:
🌈 Prism by Lumos


A smarter way to manage your Figma color variables


Prism is a powerful, easy-to-use plugin built to help you create, organize, and maintain a clean, scalable color system in Figma. Whether you’re building from scratch or refining an existing system, Prism takes the heavy lifting out of color management.


It’s the same powerful tool we use to power the Lumos Design System — with token-based color management built right in.


⸻


✨ What Prism does best

•🎨 Full Color System

Instantly generate a complete color palette (from 50 to 900) based on your base colors.

•🔗 Semantic Color Mapping

Create semantic color variables that stay linked to your base palette.

•🌗 Light & Dark Theme Support

Effortlessly manage color values for both light and dark modes.

•🧰 Visual Color Editor

Tweak colors visually with a real-time preview — no guesswork required.

•📁 Clean, Organized Structure

Keeps your color variables tidy and consistent with logical naming and folders.

•🧩 Built for Design Tokens

Prism follows a token-based approach inspired by the Lumos Design System, making it easy to plug into any design system workflow.


⸻


Prism helps you focus on what matters — great design — by handling the complexity of color systems behind the scenes. Perfect for design systems, large projects, or anyone who wants a more organized Figma file.
plugins.tagline: Color token management designed to power the Lumos Design System.

plugins.name: Numeric Variable Checker
plugins.description:
Numeric Variable Checker は、Figma上で数値のハードコーディング（Variablesが適用されていない数値）を検出し、一覧で確認できるプラグインです。


対象は、padding・spacing・width・height・cornerRadius・strokeWeight などの数値プロパティ。


Variablesが未適用の数値だけを抽出し、親子階層を含めて再帰的にチェック。

該当のフレームにはワンクリックでジャンプできます。


-


Numeric Variable Checker is a Figma plugin that helps you detect and list raw numeric values in your design—such as padding, spacing, width, height, corner radius, and stroke weight—that are not yet connected to Variables.


Whether you're building a design system or refining your layout for scalability, this plugin ensures your numbers are consistent, maintainable, and tokenized.


It recursively scans all selected frames and their children, highlights unbound values, and lets you jump to each frame with one click.
plugins.tagline: For designs that stay consistent down to the pixel.

plugins.name: Lint copy
plugins.description:
Lint copy helps UX writers and content designers automatically enforce style rules with a custom word list.


Enforce things like plain language (e.g. detect "utilize" and suggest replacing it with "use"), the company's voice and tone (e.g. detect "we are" and suggest using the contraction), and even product terminology.


Create a custom word list in JSON and host it in a public GitHub repository to experience the plugin's full power.


The plugin also enforces sentence case and strings starting with a capital, neither of which is customizable.


For full details, read the documentation.
plugins.tagline: Check text layers against a word list to enforce style, voice, and terminology.

plugins.name: Text Harvest
plugins.description:
Text Harvest exports and updates text layers in bulk with a CSV file

Get a quick CSV file from your designs for your copywriting or localization team.


Export

  1. Make a selection or export the entire page if there's no selection
  2. The plugin export only the visible layers, and also ignore the duplicated ones
  3. You'll get a CSV file with layer names and its content
  4. You can skip text layers that you don't want to export by simply adding the symbol "!" at the beginning of the layer name


Update

  1. Make a selection or update the entire page if there's no selection
  2. Select the CSV file
  3. The plugin updates all the layers with the same name


Currently multicolumn CSV are not supported. If you need to translate to different languages, upload an independent CSV for each one
plugins.tagline: Export and updates text layers in bulk with a CSV file

plugins.name: Mendly — Merge & Fix Broken Variables
plugins.description:
**Streamline your design system maintenance with powerful variable management tools.**


## Key Features


**🔄 Smart Variable Merging**

- Combine duplicate color variables into one

- Automatically updates all references throughout your design

- Preserves semantic variable relationships

- Optional renaming during merge process


**🔧 Broken Variable Detection & Repair**

- Scans current page for broken variable references

- Smart suggestions based on variable naming patterns

- Navigate between elements using the same broken variable

- Batch fix multiple variables at once


**⚡ Intelligent Analysis**

- Shows direct vs semantic variable usage

- Counts affected elements before merging

- Identifies variable dependencies

- Context-aware replacement suggestions


**🎯 Perfect For**

- Design system cleanup and maintenance

- Removing duplicate variables after design updates

- Fixing broken references after variable deletions

- Streamlining color variable organization


**💡 How It Works**

1. Select source variable (will be removed) and target variable (will remain)

2. Preview affected elements and usage statistics

3. Merge variables with one click - all references automatically update

4. Use the fix tool to repair any broken variable links


Save hours of manual work and keep your design system clean and organized!
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly merge duplicate variables and fix broken references in your design system.

plugins.name: Layer Organizer
plugins.description:
Layer Organizer

Is your Figma file a mess? Layers all over the place? Layer Organizer instantly organizes, groups, and aligns your selected layers — with real-time visual feedback.


🚀 Core Features:

  1. Auto Layer Organization: Instantly arranges and aligns selected layers for a clean, structured layout.
  2. Group Level Selection (1–5): Groups layers based on / in their names (e.g., Button/Primary), supporting deep hierarchies.
  3. Horizontal & Vertical Spacing: Set precise spacing between groups and layers. Quick presets: 200px, 400px, 1000px.
  4. Combine Single Layers: Merge single-layer groups into one clean “Ungrouped” group. Toggleable.


👀 Preview & Visualization:

  1. Real-Time Preview: See changes instantly as you organize.
  2. Group View: Visual list of group names and included layers, with type labels (Frame, Component, Vector, etc.).


⚙️ Settings & Shortcuts:

  1. Preference Memory: Automatically remembers your last settings for a smoother workflow.
  2. Default Values: Horizontal/Vertical spacing: 100px, Group level: 1, Combine single-layer groups: On.


⚡ Performance-First Architecture:

  1. Two-Stage Processing: Measures first, positions after — for faster, more accurate results.
  2. Safe Layer Sorting: Uses a temporary frame to reorder layers while preserving hierarchy and structure.


Organize! Preview! Perfect! 🧼
plugins.tagline: Auto-arrange and group layers for a cleaner, more organized Figma canvas. 🧼

plugins.name: 10x HTML | Design to clean responsive code 10x faster
plugins.description:
⚡️ Instantly turn your Figma design into clean, responsive HTML / CSS / SCSS

🚀 No registration, no paywall, click and get your code

🔍 Preview / inspect the generated code in Figma

⚡️ Test responsiveness and make live adjustments

🎓 Smart layout and naming



Who is it for ?


  1. Beginner looking to turn a design into a website starting from a clean structure where 90% of the work is already handled


  1. Advanced front-end developers looking to drastically speed up their workflow without compromising on the structure and readability of their code.


No registration required - run the plugin, select a frame and preview the result in a single click.

Works in design mode only (for now, but let us know if you're interested for dev mode)



What is 10x HTML ?


Most design-to-code tools generate bloated or messy output, with non optimized layout.

That’s because extracting logic from a visual design — especially an unstructured one — is a hard problem..


10x HTML was built from the ground up with the clear goal of solving those issues with smart rules and layout inference.


We focus on :

- Understanding layout intent

- Reducing unnecessary nesting

- Recognizing repeated patterns (even copy-pasted ones)

- Grouping elements intelligently

- and more...


10x HTML doesn't claim to replace a frontend developer — but it dramatically accelerates your workflow by giving you clean, factorized and structured code that you can build on.


Whether you're a beginner or an experienced front-end developer, 10xHTML is designed to handle most of the heavy lifting for you—making smart assumptions when needed and delivering perfect code with clear naming and structure that’s easy to build upon.


Clean, semantic code – without the mess

- Converts buttons, inputs, headers, and more into proper HTML elements

- Uses a smart class system: base classes, modifiers, and utilities based on context

- Picks optimized class names

- Flattens overly nested layers


Smart, responsive export

- Fully responsive by default — includes media and container queries

- Detects and links similar elements, even without components

- Intelligently groups and infers layout, even from unstructured designs


Live code and layout inspection

- Preview the final webpage right in Figma

- Test responsiveness

- Do live update to adjust the code

- Download the code and get ready for production


How to reach out ?

💬 Request support here

💡 Suggest an improvement here

🕷 Report a bug here

🚀 Join our Discord for support, feedback or questions..


⚠️ Note :

10x HTML is currently free and fully accessible as a Beta version.

We are trying to gather as much feedback as possible, so please feel free to post any kind of comments (bug report, idea, opinion...)

Once we reach the level of maturity we’re aiming for, we will switch to a paid model

(with very reasonable pricing)
plugins.tagline: Convert your design to high quality HTML / CSS / SCSS in one click and download your code.

plugins.name: Frames to Auto Layout
plugins.description:
We’ve all done it–selected multiple frames and tried to add auto layout to each of them, only to find that instead of adding auto layout to every frame individually as expected, Figma annoyingly groups all your selected frames and organizes them in a single auto layout.


This simple plugin provides that missing, expected functionality for Figma. With this plugin, simply select all of the frames you want to add auto layout to and run the plugin, and voila—every frame you selected will now have auto layout added, instead of the default Figma behavior of grouping the selected frames within a new frame and organizing your selected layers in a single auto layout—so annoying!


Currently the plugin simply sets the same default auto layout properties that the standard "add auto layout" UI button and command add—horizontal directionality and 10px padding and spacing. I may consider adding to this plugin the ability to configure custom default properties with a separate command—please comment if such a feature would interest you.

accepted.name: Avana Vana
accepted.description:
Senior Product Designer & Full-stack Developer

Currently Design Lead at Co:Create (www.cocreate.ink)

plugins.tagline: Add auto layout to multiple frames individually, instantly.

plugins.name: SPLOC - Selected the parent of component layer
plugins.description:
A plugin for Figma that automatically selects the parent component when any child within the component or its instance is selected.


Main features:

  1. Automatic detection and selection of the parent component
  2. Automatic collapse of the selected component
  3. On/Off switch to enable/disable functionality
  4. Memories the last selection to prevent cyclic selections


How to use:

  1. Install the plugin
  2. Launch the plugin (it is active by default)
  3. Select any element within the component or its instance
  4. The plugin will automatically:
  5. Finds the parent component
  6. Select it
  7. Flattens the structure of the component


Interface:

  1. Compact window with ON/OFF switch
  2. The switch allows you to temporarily disable plugin functionality


Technical features:

  1. Works with components (COMPONENT) and their instances (INSTANCE)
  2. Prevents cyclic selections
  3. Optimized for working with large files
  4. Minimal impact on Figma performance


Application:

Ideal for working with large component systems where switching between children and parent components is often required.


----------------------------------------



Плагин для Figma, который автоматически выделяет родительский компонент при выборе любого дочернего элемента внутри компонента или его экземпляра.


Основные возможности:

  1. Автоматическое определение и выбор родительского компонента
  2. Автоматическое схлопывание (collapse) выбранного компонента
  3. Переключатель On/Off для включения/отключения функционала
  4. Запоминание последнего выбора для предотвращения циклических выделений


Как использовать:

  1. Установите плагин
  2. Запустите плагин (он активен по умолчанию)
  3. Выберите любой элемент внутри компонента или его экземпляра
  4. Плагин автоматически:
  5. Найдет родительский компонент
  6. Выделит его
  7. Схлопнет структуру компонента


Интерфейс:

  1. Компактное окно с переключателем ON/OFF
  2. Переключатель позволяет временно отключить функционал плагина


Технические особенности:

  1. Работает с компонентами (COMPONENT) и их экземплярами (INSTANCE)
  2. Предотвращает циклические выделения
  3. Оптимизирован для работы с большими файлами
  4. Минимальное влияние на производительность Figma


Применение:

Идеально подходит для работы с большими компонентными системами, где часто требуется переключение между дочерними элементами и родительскими компонентами.
plugins.tagline: Automatically selects parent component when child layer is selected

119658.name: SPLOC - Selected the parent of component layer
119658.description:
A plugin for Figma that automatically selects the parent component when any child within the component or its instance is selected.


Main features:

  1. Automatic detection and selection of the parent component
  2. Automatic collapse of the selected component
  3. On/Off switch to enable/disable functionality
  4. Memories the last selection to prevent cyclic selections


How to use:

  1. Install the plugin
  2. Launch the plugin (it is active by default)
  3. Select any element within the component or its instance
  4. The plugin will automatically:
  5. Finds the parent component
  6. Select it
  7. Flattens the structure of the component


Interface:

  1. Compact window with ON/OFF switch
  2. The switch allows you to temporarily disable plugin functionality


Technical features:

  1. Works with components (COMPONENT) and their instances (INSTANCE)
  2. Prevents cyclic selections
  3. Optimized for working with large files
  4. Minimal impact on Figma performance


Application:

Ideal for working with large component systems where switching between children and parent components is often required.


----------------------------------------



Плагин для Figma, который автоматически выделяет родительский компонент при выборе любого дочернего элемента внутри компонента или его экземпляра.


Основные возможности:

  1. Автоматическое определение и выбор родительского компонента
  2. Автоматическое схлопывание (collapse) выбранного компонента
  3. Переключатель On/Off для включения/отключения функционала
  4. Запоминание последнего выбора для предотвращения циклических выделений


Как использовать:

  1. Установите плагин
  2. Запустите плагин (он активен по умолчанию)
  3. Выберите любой элемент внутри компонента или его экземпляра
  4. Плагин автоматически:
  5. Найдет родительский компонент
  6. Выделит его
  7. Схлопнет структуру компонента


Интерфейс:

  1. Компактное окно с переключателем ON/OFF
  2. Переключатель позволяет временно отключить функционал плагина


Технические особенности:

  1. Работает с компонентами (COMPONENT) и их экземплярами (INSTANCE)
  2. Предотвращает циклические выделения
  3. Оптимизирован для работы с большими файлами
  4. Минимальное влияние на производительность Figma

plugins.name: Frame Flow
plugins.description:
The Figma plugin “Frame Flow” allows you to duplicate the selected frame to the right or below with a predefined spacing. In addition to duplication, it also lets you insert blank frames at custom intervals. It’s especially useful when creating presentation documents, as it helps you add pages smoothly without disrupting the layout spacing. Setting up keyboard shortcuts is highly recommended for efficient use.


New Frame

Creates a new empty frame with the specified size.


Add Frame Right

Creates a new empty frame with the specified size to the right of the currently selected frame.

Recommended shortcut: ⌘ + ⌥ (Option) + → (Right Arrow)


Add Frame Below

Creates a new empty frame with the specified size below the currently selected frame.

Recommended shortcut: ⌘ + ⌥ (Option) + ↓ (Down Arrow)


Duplicate Frame Right

Duplicates the currently selected frame to the right.

Recommended shortcut: ⌘ + ⌥ (Option) + ⇧ (Shift) + → (Right Arrow)


Duplicate Frame Below

Duplicates the currently selected frame below.

Recommended shortcut: ⌘ + ⌥ (Option) + ⇧ (Shift) + ↓ (Down Arrow)


Settings

Configure various parameters.




Figmaプラグイン「Frame Flow」は、選択中のフレームを、事前に設定した間隔で右隣や下に複製できるプラグインです。複製のみではなく、白紙のフレームを好きな間隔で配置することも可能です。主に資料作成時、ページの間隔を崩さずスムーズにページを増やしていきたい時に活躍します。ショートカットを設定するのがおすすめです。


New Frame

設定したサイズの空フレームを新規作成します。


Add Frame Right

いま選択しているフレームの右隣に、設定したサイズの空フレームを新規作成します。おすすめショートカットキーは⌘ + ⌥(option) + →(右矢印)です。


Add Frame Below

いま選択しているフレームの下に、設定したサイズの空フレームを新規作成します。おすすめショートカットキーは⌘ + ⌥(option) + ↓(下矢印)です。


Duplicate Frame Right

いま選択しているフレームの右隣に、フレームを複製します。

おすすめショートカットキーは⌘ + ⌥(option) + ⇧(shift) + →(右矢印)です。


Duplicate Frame Below

いま選択しているフレームの下に、フレームを複製します。

おすすめショートカットキーは⌘ + ⌥(option) + ⇧(shift) + ↓(下矢印)です。


Settings

様々な値を設定します。
plugins.tagline: Quickly layout 1920x1080 frames

plugins.name: 图形透视变换 Perspective Transform
plugins.description:
介绍

图形透视变换是一个强大的 Figma 插件，专为设计师打造，帮助您轻松实现矢量图形的透视变形。通过直观的界面和灵活的控制，您可以快速调整图形的四个角点，创造出专业级的设计效果。


功能说明

  1. 实时透视调整：通过拖动四个角点，实时调整矢量图形的透视效果。
  2. 精确控制：基于相对比例定位，确保变形的精准性和一致性。
  3. 自动更新：选择新的图形时，插件自动重新计算并定位角点。
  4. 重置功能：一键恢复图形到初始状态，方便反复调整。
  5. 兼容多种图形：支持矩形及简单的四边形矢量图形。


使用方法

  1. 在 Figma 中选择一个矩形或四边形矢量图形。
  2. 运行透视变换（专业版）插件。
  3. 在插件界面中，拖动四个角点以调整图形的透视效果。
  4. 点击“重置”按钮可将图形恢复到原始状态。
  5. 观察 Figma 中的图形实时更新，直至达到满意的设计效果。


注意事项

  1. 仅支持简单的四边形路径，复杂路径可能无法正确解析。
  2. 在使用插件前，建议备份原始图形以防止数据丢失。
  3. 插件当前版本不支持曲线或多路径的矢量图形。
  4. 确保 Figma 已更新到最新版本，以获得最佳使用体验。


Introduction

Perspective Transform Pro is a powerful Figma plugin designed for designers to effortlessly achieve perspective transformations on vector graphics. With an intuitive interface and flexible controls, you can quickly adjust the four corner points of your graphics to create professional-grade design effects.


Function Description

  1. Real-Time Perspective Adjustment: Manipulate the four corner points to adjust the perspective of vector graphics in real-time.
  2. Precise Control: Based on relative proportions, ensuring accuracy and consistency in transformations.
  3. Automatic Updates: Automatically recalculates and repositions corner points when selecting new graphics.
  4. Reset Functionality: One-click reset to restore graphics to their original state for easy adjustments.
  5. Compatibility with Various Shapes: Supports rectangles and simple quadrilateral vector graphics.


How to Use

  1. Select a rectangle or quadrilateral vector graphic in Figma.
  2. Run the Perspective Transform Pro plugin.
  3. In the plugin interface, drag the four corner points to adjust the perspective effect.
  4. Click the "Reset" button to restore the graphic to its original state.
  5. Observe the graphic in Figma updating in real-time until you achieve the desired design effect.


Precautions

  1. Supports only simple quadrilateral paths; complex paths may not parse correctly.
  2. It is recommended to backup original graphics before using the plugin to prevent data loss.
  3. The current version does not support curved or multi-path vector graphics.
  4. Ensure Figma is updated to the latest version for the best user experience.

plugins.tagline: Advanced Perspective Transformation for Designers

plugins.name: Figma to Scabld
plugins.description:
Effortlessly Import Your Figma Designs into Scabld!


Transform your designs into mobile apps in no time with the Scabld plugin for Figma. Seamlessly bring your Figma screens into Scabld and move from design to a fully functional mobile app without any coding required. Our plugin automatically adapts your design to Scabld's no-code platform, so you can focus on turning your vision into reality.


How to use this plugin


1. Install the free Figma plugin.

2. Select your Figma designs.

3. Import them directly into Scabld.

4. Continue editing and customizing just like in Figma.

5. Add interactions and animations.

6. Finalize and publish your mobile app with zero code.


With Scabld, skip the hassle of manual conversions. Simply import your Figma files into our no-code platform and turn them into fully functional mobile apps. We preserve your layer names and design structure, making it easy to pick up where you left off and enhance your creations for a smooth user experience.


Preserve your layer structure.

When you import your designs, all your Figma groups and layer names are kept intact. This allows you to refine, adjust, and polish your app directly in Scabld without losing any important details.


Performance and optimization guaranteed.

When you publish with Scabld, we ensure your mobile app is optimized for peak performance across all devices. Every file is tuned for a fast and smooth experience, providing a high-quality result without compromising speed.


To learn more about Scabld and explore our other features, visit scabld.com.
plugins.tagline: Import your Figma designs into Scabld effortlessly.

plugins.name: TextSwapper
plugins.description:
Features


Easily customize text for legal contracts, sales proposals, and resumes in Figma.

Quickly update text without needing extra tools.

Streamlined text replacement for multiple objects, components, and frames.

Simple and intuitive interface for seamless integration with your workflow.

Save time ⏰ and eliminate the hassle of manually editing text in Figma!

How:


Add the word "page" to the name of your page frame (e.g., agreement_page).

Enter the text you want to replace in the "Find text" field (e.g., {company name}).

Enter the new text in the "Replace with" field (e.g., Figma).

Use the "Update" button to replace the specified line, or the "Update All" button to replace all occurrences of the text in your document.

Use the + and - buttons to adjust the number of text fields.

Click Save to store your list of text replacements for faster updates when working on the same document.

Use Load to retrieve your saved list of text replacements and automatically fill in the fields. The current version retrieves only the latest saved list.

Click Download Selected Pages as PDF to download the selected pages as one merged PDF file.
plugins.tagline: Easily customize text for legal contracts, sales proposals, and resumes—no extra tools needed.
